title: I’m the Bad Guy
description:
by Linen

Bakugou couldn’t help but feel as if someone was watching him almost everywhere he went.

He thought he was just being paranoid until some of his friends, classmates and other people started disappearing.

Words: 1033, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death

summary: Ever since I read the new chapter and the whole Hawk/Best Jeanist thing happened, I just can't take out of my mind that BJ is...
body:
I don’t know about you guys but…

Ever since I read the new chapter and the whole Hawk/Best Jeanist thing happened, I just can’t take out of my mind that BJ is not really dead, and the bizarre part of my brain screams something that I can’t ignore.

I mean, he’s like… Jeans. I know he can manipulate fabrics and such but still JEANS.

What if the little fucker is alive, but folded inside the bag just like a god damn pair of J E A N S?

I know it’s not real but I am still unable to unthink this.

blog.name: ao3feed-kiribaku
blog.title: Shitty Hair x Blasty Fanfics
blog.description:
☆Kirishima Eijirou/Bakugou Katsuki fanfics☆
☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: Marriage Prize
description:
by Tenkku

Kirishima is an alpha slave brought to work on the building of a new stable at Ignis Hall, the manor home of the Bakugo Family. Katsuki Bakugo is an intelligent, savage, quick-witted, and outspoken omega who refuses any and all alpha suitors his parents find for him. Kirishima instantly falls in love with his new master, though they come from opposite worlds. Bakugo was trained with all the skills and knowledge of an alpha, so no one can tame him, and he constantly reminds people of this key fact. Kirishima will do anything for Bakugo, but the angry omega goes out of his way to brutalize and insult Kirishima at every turn; until one heated night where feelings change. Kirishima is powerless to court, wed, and mate Bakugo, but he is determined to have the omega for his own and tame the wild nature of Katsuki Bakugo with love and respect. But rules and regulations apply, and the forbidden pair will encounter many trials that could very well lead to Kirishima’s ultimate punishment: death. After all, the wealthiest and most sought after omega in all the kingdom cannot allow himself to fall for the strong and gentle nature of a lowly foreign slave. (Classic tale of forbidden love between high and low members of society)

Words: 3924, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Kirishima Eijirou, Midoriya Izuku, Todoroki Shouto, Tokoyami Fumikage, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, Yagi Toshinori | All Might, Shouji Mezou
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou, Midoriya Izuku/Tokoyami Fumikage, Bakugou Katsuki/Todoroki Shouto
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe, Alternate History, Alpha/Beta/Omega Dynamics, Arranged Marriage, Secret Relationship, Intimacy, Knotting, Oral Sex, Anal Sex, Alternate Universe - 1920s, Erotica, Courtship, Developing Relationship, Mpreg, Forbidden Love, Hate to Love, Slavery

summary: Hejo!  Oto jedna z moich najnowszych prac. Co prawda nie wyszło jak chciałam, ale mówi się trudno i żyje się dalej. Prawdę...
caption:
Hejo!

Oto jedna z moich najnowszych prac. Co prawda nie wyszło jak chciałam, ale mówi się trudno i żyje się dalej. Prawdę mówiąc dopiero od niedawna zaczęłam bawić się z grafiką, więc do końca jeszcze tego nie ogarniam. Chociaż jeśli mam być szczera szkice też nie wychodzą mi lepiej …

Narysowałam Izuku Midoriyę, inaczej zwanego mianem Deku, gdyż jest on jednym z moich ulubionych bohaterów(wiem, jestem bardzo orgjnalna :P), a na razie mam fazę na super bohaterów, więc możecie się spodziewać w najbliższym okresie jednego z jego kolegów ( i jednocześnie osobę z którą go paringuję :P )

Hejo!

Oto jedna z moich najnowszych prac. Co prawda nie wyszło jak chciałam, ale mówi się trudno i żyje się dalej. Prawdę mówiąc dopiero od niedawna zaczęłam bawić się z grafiką, więc do końca jeszcze tego nie ogarniam. Chociaż jeśli mam być szczera szkice też nie wychodzą mi lepiej …

Narysowałam Izuku Midoriyę, inaczej zwanego mianem Deku, gdyż jest on jednym z moich ulubionych bohaterów(wiem, jestem bardzo orgjnalna :P), a na razie mam fazę na super bohaterów, więc możecie się spodziewać w najbliższym okresie jednego z jego kolegów ( i jednocześnie osobę z którą go paringuję :P )

blog.name: ao3feed-shouji
blog.title: Shouji Mezou
blog.description: An automatic feed of fics for Shouji Mezou from My Hero Academia posted on Archive of Our Own. If there's an issue or if you have any questions, let me know! (For those on mobile, search "tags" to see the taglist!)

title: Marriage Prize
description:
by Tenkku

Kirishima is an alpha slave brought to work on the building of a new stable at Ignis Hall, the manor home of the Bakugo Family. Katsuki Bakugo is an intelligent, savage, quick-witted, and outspoken omega who refuses any and all alpha suitors his parents find for him. Kirishima instantly falls in love with his new master, though they come from opposite worlds. Bakugo was trained with all the skills and knowledge of an alpha, so no one can tame him, and he constantly reminds people of this key fact. Kirishima will do anything for Bakugo, but the angry omega goes out of his way to brutalize and insult Kirishima at every turn; until one heated night where feelings change. Kirishima is powerless to court, wed, and mate Bakugo, but he is determined to have the omega for his own and tame the wild nature of Katsuki Bakugo with love and respect. But rules and regulations apply, and the forbidden pair will encounter many trials that could very well lead to Kirishima’s ultimate punishment: death. After all, the wealthiest and most sought after omega in all the kingdom cannot allow himself to fall for the strong and gentle nature of a lowly foreign slave. (Classic tale of forbidden love between high and low members of society)

Words: 3924, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply

  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou, Midoriya Izuku/Tokoyami Fumikage, Bakugou Katsuki/Todoroki Shouto
